001package com.technototes.library.subsystem.drivebase;
002
003import java.util.function.DoubleSupplier;
004
005import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorSimple;
006
007import com.technototes.library.hardware.motor.Motor;
008import com.technototes.library.hardware.motor.MotorGroup;
009import com.technototes.library.subsystem.DeviceSubsystem;
010
011/** Class for DriveBase subsystems
012 * @author Alex Stedman The motors for the drivebase
013 * @param <T> The type of motors for the drivebase
014 */
015public abstract class DrivebaseSubsystem<T extends DcMotorSimple> extends DeviceSubsystem<MotorGroup<T>> {
016
017    protected DoubleSupplier gyroSupplier = () -> 0;
018
019    @Deprecated
020    public enum SampleDriveSpeed {
021        SNAIL(0.2),
022        NORMAL(0.5),
023        TURBO(1);
024        public double spe;
025
026        SampleDriveSpeed(double s) {
027            spe = s;
028        }
029
030        public double getSpeed() {
031            return spe;
032        }
033    }
034
035    /** The default drive speeds
036     *
037     */
038    @Deprecated
039    public SampleDriveSpeed driveSpeed = SampleDriveSpeed.NORMAL;
040
041    /** Create a drivebase subsystem
042     *
043     * @param motors The drive motors
044     */
045    public DrivebaseSubsystem(Motor<T>... motors) {
046        super(new MotorGroup<T>(motors));
047    }
048    /** Create a drivebase subsystem
049     * @param gyro The gyro supplier
050     * @param motors The drive motors
051     */
052    public DrivebaseSubsystem(DoubleSupplier gyro, Motor<T>... motors) {
053        super(new MotorGroup<T>(motors));
054        gyroSupplier = gyro;
055    }
056
057    public double getScale(double... powers) {
058        double max = 0;
059        for (double d : powers) {
060            max = Math.max(Math.abs(d), max);
061        }
062        return max;
063    }
064    /** Get the Gyro angle
065     *
066     * @return Gyro angle from supplier
067     */
068    public double getGyro() {
069        return gyroSupplier.getAsDouble();
070    }
071
072    public double getSpeed() {
073        return 1;
074    }
075}
